title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
Traveling to Italy or nearby countries? This simple, safe plug adapter makes charging your everyday devices easy.

What it is
- A set of 3 plug adapters (Type L) for Italy and several other countries.
- Each adapter has: 2 American-style outlets + 2 USB ports.
- Small and light. Easy to pack and hold.

Where it works
- Works in: Italy, Vatican City, San Marino, Uruguay, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, and Syria.

What you can plug in
- American 2-prong or 3-prong plugs (the flat ones).
- Good for phones, tablets, power banks, e‑readers, and other small electronics.
- USB ports can charge up to 2.4A (fast for phones and tablets).

Safety and quality
- Grounded 3-prong design for safer use.
- CE and FCC certified.
- 12‑month warranty and friendly customer service.

Important notes (please read)
- This is an adapter, not a voltage converter.
- Many small electronics (phones, tablets, cameras) are “dual voltage” and will work fine.
- Larger items like hair dryers, curling irons, or some CPAPs may not be dual voltage. Check the label on your device. If it says “100–250V” or “Input: 110–240V,” you’re good. If it only says “120V,” do not use it with this adapter without a separate voltage converter.

Easy steps to use
1) Plug your American device into the adapter (or use the USB ports).
2) Plug the adapter into the wall outlet in Italy (Type L).
3) Turn on your device as usual.

Size
- About 2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches per adapter. Fits easily in a purse or carry-on.

In short
- 4-in-1 convenience: 2 outlets + 2 USB.
- Safe, small, and simple.
- Perfect for keeping your phone and tablet charged while you travel.
